QuestData.Title: Slitherscale Suppression
QuestData.Description: The Slitherscale take orders from their leader, the Slitherscale Lizard-Lord. He can be found celebrating his victories on the southeastern corner of Windward Isle.$B$BIf we can destroy this leader, we can deal their tribe a great blow.$B$BWithout their lord, the Slitherscale will think twice before attacking the gentle cloud serpents of the east.
